name: QB (itch) (Rogocat)
description:
QB is a 3D third person view maze game. Play QB the little robot, in a sci-fi labyrinth and try to collect as many Energypellets as you can. Beware though, you are not alone in the maze.

This game is made with unity and supports Keyboard and Controller by INSERT_COIN

This is a student project,  we might continue working on QB! Give us Feedback in the comments :)
